# Gembomb (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Force Spells|force]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 2]], [[Gnome (Domain)|Gnome 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[Trade (Domain)|Trade 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, M (a gem worth at least 1 gp.)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Gem touched

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level or until used

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 101

*You place a small spark of energy in the heart of a valuable gem.*

You turn a gem into a bomb that you (and only you) can lob at enemies. You must hold the gem in your hand when casting the spell.

You can toss the bomb with perfect accuracy anywhere within 60 feet. The gembomb explodes in a 5-footradius burst dealing 1d8 points of force damage per two caster levels (maximum 5d8). Tossing a gembomb is a standard action.

**GM Note**

*House Rule* Added Assassin 2, Sorcerer 2, Wizard 2 to Level.
